result.orig: Agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobh

result.ponchtml: Agus dá mba ḃuama é caiṫfiḋ gur ċeann ollṁór é a ṗléascfaḋ an foirgneaṁ amaċ ar ḋá ṫaoḃAnd if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.

result.eng: Those strange questions were suddenly cleared out of my mind.
result.ga: Glanadh na ceisteanna aisteacha seo amach as m'intinn go tobann
result.orig: Glanadh na ceisteanna aisteacha seo amach as m'intinn go tobann
result.html: Glanadh na ceisteanna aisteacha seo amach as m'intinn go tobannThose strange questions were suddenly cleared out of my mind.
result.ponchtml: Glanaḋ na ceisteanna aisteaċa seo amaċ as m'intinn go tobannThose strange questions were suddenly cleared out of my mind.

result.eng: Four weeks after the attacks American forces carried out an invasion i to Afghanistan.
result.ga: Ceithre seachtainí i ndiaidh na n-ionsaithe rinne fórsaí Mheiriceá ionruathar isteach san Afganastáin
result.orig: Ceithre seachtainí i ndiaidh na n-ionsaithe rinne fórsaí Mheiriceá ionruathar isteach san Afganastáin
result.html: Ceithre seachtainí i ndiaidh na n-ionsaithe rinne fórsaí Mheiriceá ionruathar isteach san AfganastáinFour weeks after the attacks American forces carried out an invasion i to Afghanistan.
result.ponchtml: Ceiṫre seaċtainí i ndiaiḋ na n-ionsaiṫe rinne fórsaí Ṁeiriceá ionruaṫar isteaċ san AfganastáinFour weeks after the attacks American forces carried out an invasion i to Afghanistan.

result.eng: They carried out an invasion on Iraq one and half year after that.
result.ga: Rinne siad ionruathar ar an Iaráic bliain go leith ina dhiaidh sin
result.orig: Rinne siad ionruathar ar an Iaráic bliain go leith ina dhiaidh sin
result.html: Rinne siad ionruathar ar an Iaráic bliain go leith ina dhiaidh sinThey carried out an invasion on Iraq one and half year after that.
result.ponchtml: Rinne siad ionruaṫar ar an Iaráic bliain go leiṫ ina ḋiaiḋ sinThey carried out an invasion on Iraq one and half year after that.

result.eng: A smile broke out on the receptionist's face.
result.ga: Bhris meangadh gáire amach ar aghaidh an fháilteora
result.orig: Bhris meangadh gáire amach ar aghaidh an fháilteora
result.html: Bhris meangadh gáire amach ar aghaidh an fháilteoraA smile broke out on the receptionist's face.
result.ponchtml: Ḃris meangaḋ gáire amaċ ar aġaiḋ an ḟáilteoraA smile broke out on the receptionist's face.

result.eng: She knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].
result.ga: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirín
result.orig: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirín
result.html: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirínShe knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].
result.ponchtml: Ṫuig sí go maiṫ gur iomaí iriseoir a tógaḋ amaċ as an óstán ar ċláirínShe knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].

result.eng: The relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.
result.ga: Tugann scaoilteacht an idirlín ardán d'achan chineál cancráin a bheith ag caitheamh anuas ar dhaoine eile faoi sciath na ganfhiosaíochta
result.orig: Tugann scaoilteacht an idirlín ardán d'achan chineál cancráin a bheith ag caitheamh anuas ar dhaoine eile faoi sciath na ganfhiosaíochta
result.html: Tugann scaoilteacht an idirlín ardán d'achan chineál cancráin a bheith ag caitheamh anuas ar dhaoine eile faoi sciath na ganfhiosaíochtaThe relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.
result.ponchtml: Tugann scaoilteaċt an idirlín ardán d'aċan ċineál cancráin a ḃeiṫ ag caiṫeaṁ anuas ar ḋaoine eile faoi sciaṫ na ganḟiosaíoċtaThe relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.

result.eng: Hardly any professional journalist is able to make a career out of blogging.
result.ga: Is beag iriseoir gairmiúil atá ábalta a bheatha a bhaint i dtír leis an bhlagadóireacht
result.orig: Is beag iriseoir gairmiúil atá ábalta a bheatha a bhaint i dtír leis an bhlagadóireacht
result.html: Is beag iriseoir gairmiúil atá ábalta a bheatha a bhaint i dtír leis an bhlagadóireachtHardly any professional journalist is able to make a career out of blogging.
result.ponchtml: Is beag iriseoir gairmiúil atá ábalta a ḃeaṫa a ḃaint i dtír leis an ḃlagadóireaċtHardly any professional journalist is able to make a career out of blogging.

result.eng: As soon as the colonists found out that there as good land in the new world,...
result.ga: Ar fáil amach do na cóilínigh go raibh talamh mhaith sa domhan nua
result.orig: Ar fáil amach do na cóilínigh go raibh talamh mhaith sa domhan nua
result.html: Ar fáil amach do na cóilínigh go raibh talamh mhaith sa domhan nuaAs soon as the colonists found out that there as good land in the new world,...
result.ponchtml: Ar fáil amaċ do na cóilíniġ go raiḃ talaṁ ṁaiṫ sa doṁan nuaAs soon as the colonists found out that there as good land in the new world,...

result.eng: As the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
result.ga: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíocht
result.orig: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíocht
result.html: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíochtAs the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
result.ponchtml: Mar a leaṫ an tír siar amaċ ṫáinig níos mó stáit isteaċ san aontaċt nár ġlac le scláḃaíoċtAs the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.

result.eng: Get out of my way!
result.ga: Amach as mo bhealach leat
result.orig: Amach as mo bhealach leat
result.html: Amach as mo bhealach leatGet out of my way!
result.ponchtml: Amaċ as mo ḃealaċ leatGet out of my way!

result.eng: It is unsuitable for you to hang out with people like him.
result.ga: Ní cuideachta ar an domhan duit é
result.orig: Ní cuideachta ar an domhan duit é
result.html: Ní cuideachta ar an domhan duit éIt is unsuitable for you to hang out with people like him.
result.ponchtml: Ní cuideaċta ar an doṁan duit éIt is unsuitable for you to hang out with people like him.

result.eng: Don't be out for too long.
result.ga: Ná bí i bhfad amuigh
result.orig: Ná bí i bhfad amuigh
result.html: Ná bí i bhfad amuighDon't be out for too long.
result.ponchtml: Ná bí i ḃfad amuiġDon't be out for too long.

result.eng: He wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.
result.ga: Ní raibh a cheann le tógáil aige as ólachán
result.orig: Ní raibh a cheann le tógáil aige as ólachán
result.html: Ní raibh a cheann le tógáil aige as ólachánHe wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ a ċeann le tógáil aige as ólaċánHe wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.

result.eng: You are out of pain. You are out of your misery. [You are dead.]
result.ga: Tá tú as pianaigh
result.orig: Tá tú as pianaigh
result.html: Tá tú as pianaighYou are out of pain. You are out of your misery. [You are dead.]
result.ponchtml: Tá tú as pianaiġYou are out of pain. You are out of your misery. [You are dead.]

result.eng: It doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
result.ga: Is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astu
result.orig: Is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astu
result.html: Is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astuIt doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma dá mbíoḋ siad ag magaḋ ort go dtiteaḋ an cár astuIt doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.

result.eng: They took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.
result.ga: Thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an lá
result.orig: Thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an lá
result.html: Thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an láThey took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.
result.ponchtml: Ṫóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roiṁ an láThey took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.

result.eng: The streets we emptying and the lights were going out.
result.ga: Bhí na sráideanna ag bánú agus na solais ag gabháil as
result.orig: Bhí na sráideanna ag bánú agus na solais ag gabháil as
result.html: Bhí na sráideanna ag bánú agus na solais ag gabháil asThe streets we emptying and the lights were going out.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí na sráideanna ag bánú agus na solais ag gaḃáil asThe streets we emptying and the lights were going out.
